pages:
This is the area where you can type things.

Usage examples:
- To-do list
- Study progress
- Goals
- Famous Quotes
- Project ideas

---------------------

Key borad shortcuts

Ctrl + S: save note
Ctrl + R: move right

---------------------

Page Navigation

〈  → previous
 〉 → next

Don't forget!

A little note today, a big change tomorrow. 

Your words shape your journey ^_^



(Btw, press "》" to create a new page. You can create unlimited pages.)
